chapters.title: Chapter 1: An Empty Road
chapters.info: Ishamael, p. 12—One of the Forsaken, the thirteen Aes Sedai who dedicated their lives to serving the Shadow during the War of the Shadow. His name means "Betrayer of Hope" in the Old Tongue. He was called Elan Morin Tedronai in the Age of Legends, before he turned to the Shadow. His name is still used to frighten children. See also Betrayer of Hope;
